El Sortidors is an anchor of cool, hip, up-and-coming Parlament Street.  It attracts a slightly older, more up-scale clientele than some of its neighbors, but that doesn't mean you can't have a fun, relaxed time.I love the decor in Els Sortidors: spacious rooms, high cielings, and summer ferns add a Mediterranean air of clean, comfortable class to the establishment.  Wine barrels dotting the back serve as tables around which groups of yuppies and other, less pretentious professionals enjoy a glass of wine after work or before dinner.  The restaurant has an excellent wine selection and delicious, if slightly pricey, food.  The service is charming, attentive, and pleasant.Els Sortidors is definitely a must on any trip down Parlament!
